differences.news_card: Current uses #2a2a2a vs Config #1C1C1E - Current is lighter/grayer
differences.secondary_bg: Current has more granular secondary colors (#1E1E1E, #252525)

differences.padding: Current: 20px vs Config: 16px - Current has more padding
differences.background: Current: #2a2a2a vs Config: #1C1C1E - Current is lighter
differences.shadow: Current: No shadow vs Config: Has shadow with rgba(0,0,0,0.2)

differences.headline: Current: 20px vs Config: 16px - Current is larger
differences.sentiment: Current: 14px vs Config: 12px - Current is larger
differences.timestamp: Current: 14px vs Config: 12px - Current is larger

differences.consistency: Config uses numeric weights (400-600) vs Current uses 'bold'
differences.granularity: Config has more specific weight definitions for each element

differences.summary_text: Current: #888888 vs Config: #9CA3AF - Config is slightly lighter
differences.source_links: Current: #4a9eff vs Config: #3B82F6 - Different blue shades
differences.timestamp: Current: #666666 vs Config: #6B7280 - Config is slightly lighter

differences.padding_vertical: Current: 8px vs Config: 6px - Current is taller
differences.border_radius: Current: 20px vs Config: 999px - Config is more pill-shaped
differences.margin_right: Current: 10px vs Config: 8px - Current has more spacing

differences.standardization: Config uses consistent 16px for most icons vs Current varies (14-20px)

background_consistency.notes: Both use #121212 as primary background, very close secondary backgrounds

news_card_styling.notes: Current has more padding, lighter background, no shadows vs Config

typography.notes: Current uses larger headlines (20px vs 16px), different font weight conventions

color_scheme.notes: Sentiment colors are nearly identical, slight variations in grays and blues

filter_buttons.notes: Very similar styling with small padding and radius differences

to_match_config: Reduce news card padding from 20px to 16px
Change news card background from #2a2a2a to #1C1C1E
Add shadow to news cards (rgba(0,0,0,0.2) with 4px radius)
Reduce headline font size from 20px to 16px
Change summary text color from #888888 to #9CA3AF
Update source link color from #4a9eff to #3B82F6
Use numeric font weights (400-600) instead of 'bold'
Standardize icon sizes to 16px where appropriate
Change filter button border radius from 20px to 999px for pill shape
current_advantages: Larger headlines (20px) may be more readable
More padding (20px) provides better touch targets
Border on cards provides better visual separation
